title: President approves 90 days remission in sentences of prisoners on Eid Milad-un-Nabi (SAW)
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 7 (APP): President Dr. Arif Alvi, on the occasion of Eid Milad-un-Nabi (SAW), has approved 90 days remission in the sentences of prisoners.
The remission in sentences, approved by the President under Article 45 of the Constitution, will applicable on the male and female prisoners of over 65 and 60 years of age, respectively, having completed one-third of their imprisonment period.
The remission in sentences will also be applicable on the prisoners of under 18 years of age having completed one-third of their imprisonment period, a press release issued by the Presidentâ€™s Media Wing here on Friday said.
However, the remission in sentences will not be applicable on the prisoners involved in heinous acts like murder, espionage, anti-state activities, rape, theft, robbery, kidnapping, terrorism, financial crimes as well as those convicted for inflicting loss to national kitty, it added.
